p: Polysaccharides in the secretory cells and subcuticular space were stained pink-red (Fig. 3i). This reaction was positive with insoluble polysaccharides of non-glandular trichomes and epidermal cell polysaccharides. Drops of secretion localized in the secretory cells of the glandular head emitted intense autofluorescence under UV excitation (Fig. 3j).
